author: tensorflower-gardener
message:
[XLA] Add temporary workaround for building for Linux aarch64 using NVCC. Details: https://github.com/openxla/xla/issues/28256

Linux aarch64 hermetic builds are not supported yet, so as a temporary
solution flag `--config=cuda_nvcc_linux_aarch64` was added.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 797000747

files.patch:
@@ -194,8 +194,6 @@ build:cuda --@rules_ml_toolchain//common:enable_cuda
 build:cuda --config=cuda_version
 # This flag is needed to include CUDA libraries.
 build:cuda --@local_config_cuda//cuda:include_cuda_libs=true
-# TODO(yuriit): Remove this once Linux aarch64 hermetic build is supported.
-build:cuda --crosstool_top=@local_config_cuda//crosstool:toolchain
 
 # This configuration is used for building the wheels.
 build:cuda_wheel --@local_config_cuda//cuda:include_cuda_libs=false
@@ -234,6 +232,12 @@ build:cuda_nvcc --@local_config_cuda//:cuda_compiler=nvcc
 # Old config for backward compatibility
 build:nvcc_clang --config=cuda_nvcc
 
+# TODO(yuriit): Remove this once Linux aarch64 hermetic build is supported.
+# This is a temporary solution to build for Linux aarch64 by using NVCC.
+build:cuda_nvcc_linux_aarch64 --config=cuda_nvcc
+build:cuda_nvcc_linux_aarch64 --config=clang_local
+build:cuda_nvcc_linux_aarch64 --crosstool_top=@local_config_cuda//crosstool:toolchain
+
 # Debug config. Enables Bazel's 'dbg' compilation mode, build with debugging enabled
 build:dbg -c dbg
 # Compiling all dependencies with debug info can cause linker failures
